name: Consummate Technologies
tagline: To Bring In a State Of Perfection
description:
Consummate is a technology consulting and services organization having a team of professionals who has many years of experience in Travel and Tourism, Disaster Management, Govt. Services Enablement, RFID [Radio Frequency Identification], Educational, Healthcare, Social Welfare and Research services, Telecom, Banking and Finance, Insurance, Retail, Transport & Logistics, Life Sciences and Pharmaceuticals, Consumer Products and ecommerce.
The team has development Web Applications in various domains like Travel & Tourism Applications [Ex: Hotels, Resorts, Restaurants, etc…], Media Applications [Ex: Newspapers, TV Channels, etc…], Event Management Portals, Job Portals, Matrimonial Portals, Any kind of E-Commerce Solutions.
